_source.short_desc: SMS texting and live chat for business has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.
_source.long_desc:
SMS texting and live chat has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.  With no programming required, you can setup your Avochato phone number in minutes to text your prospects, customers, or staff. Segment, import, and broadcast to your contacts to scale your teams communications.

Avochato integrates with platforms such as Salesforce, Slack, MS Teams, and Zapier. Enable prospects to text you from a Google Ad with the AdWords API integration.
_source.target_audience: Businesses and teams that want effective customer communications.  Examples include ecommerce, insurance, home care agencies, realtors, auto dealerships, delivery and logistics companies, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Survey software for the creation, distribution, and analysis of surveys, polls, and forms.
related_products.features:
QuestionPro is a leading SaaS survey solutions company providing a wide range of applications to measure and manage customer experience, employee engagement, and the pulse of the audience. Collect data and gain insights that help you make smarter decisions.

Send surveys in under 5 mins with 40+ question types, ready-made survey templates, and customizable design themes. We are ISO 27001 certified and comply with leading data security standards and data privacy laws including GDPR.

related_products.short_desc: Fully featured business text messaging platform to send bulk SMS text messages to customers, staff, and partners.
related_products.features: TextMagic is a fully featured business text messaging platform that enables companies of all sizes to send bulk SMS text messages to their customers, staff, and partners. The service can be used to send sms notifications, alerts, and confirmations to clients, as well as to conduct SMS marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales through the power of texting. Text all your customers in seconds.
related_products.features: Mobile Text Alerts is an easy-to-use business SMS solution offering better customer engagement (and therefore more sales) through the power of texting. Get up and running in seconds and enjoy our user-friendly online platform and mobile app, allowing you to easily and efficiently engage customers with survey questions, promotions, and other updates. Free up time and hassle with automated messaging, flexible opt-in choices to build your subscriber list, analytics options, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
related_products.features: Get real-time feedback at scale with SurveyMonkey SMS Surveys. Reach your audience at critical moments - wherever they are, even if you don't have their email address. Improve response rates with surveys that are optimized for mobile and easy to complete. Customize your message to encourage participation, and easily track individual response status. Get the feedback you need, fast, so you can deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention?, and unlock growth and innovation.

related_products.short_desc: Get 10X the response rate with in text surveys without any external links in order for participants to the take the survey!
related_products.features: TextP2P offers in text surveys without any external links in order for participants to the take the survey. This means your response rates will be 10X! TextP2P provides single choice, multiple choice, or qualitative answers. All responses are graphed and detailed responses can be exported. Try it for FREE for 14 days and get 100 FREE text credits.

related_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
related_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

related_products.short_desc: Business SMS for marketing, sales, and customer service. Contacts never has to install an app, your team gets business grade features.
related_products.features:
Heymarket is business text messaging for companies with 100+ employees. Your customers never have to install an app and use SMS, Facebook Messenger, Apple Business Chat, Google's Business Messages, and WhatsApp. Your team can send, read, and reply to messages from Heymarket Web on their computers, the native iOS app (featured by Apple), or Android app.

Heymarket works with leading enterprise apps including: Salesforce, HubSpot, Microsoft Teams, Slack, Zendesk, Zapier, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Curogram is a cloud-based HIPAA compliant patient engagement platform that integrates with all EMR/EHR systems.
related_products.features:
Curogram is a cloud-based HIPAA-compliant patient engagement platform that integrates with all EMR/EHR systems. 

Curogram provides a complete patient engagement experience for a fraction of the cost of a postage stamp. The platform includes: easy-to-use secure two-way texting, electronic patient forms, smart appointment booking and reminders, mass texting, automated survey and rating requests, online payments  and multi-user telemedicine.

related_products.short_desc: A group text & SMS marketing software platform where you only pay a one time fee for the software and the wholesale costs of texts.
related_products.features: UltraSMSScript is a uniquely positioned, easy to use, web-based group text and SMS marketing software platform. Either install UltraSMSScript on your own server and pay a 1-time fee for the platform, or have us host it for you with our monthly hosted plans! What about the cost to send text messages? In most cases, it's a fraction of a penny. Since we're linked directly to the text-messaging gateways, you only pay the wholesale costs of texts!

related_products.short_desc: Business Text Messaging for Smarter, Smoother Operations
related_products.features: Can your contacts and customers text you? Keep connected to contacts and customers with a smarter, simpler, business text messaging app. Use MessageDesk to organize contacts into groups, send group text messages without "reply all" and schedule text messages to send in the future. Small businesses and organizations that use QuickBooks Online can also get paid faster by texting links to QuickBooks Online invoices.

related_products.short_desc: Sign Up with JookSMS now for your SMS marketing needs and receive 250 free credits  & number to test our platform. No Deposit Required!
related_products.features:
JookSMS has been ranking consistently as one of the best SMS providers over the last 5 years. Over 2000 companies call us home for their SMS needs. Check out our flexible pricing plans with no contracts required. 

Sign up today and receive 250 free credits along with a phone number to test our service. No credit card or deposit required. Free Demo also with one of our customer support specialists.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: Get real-time feedback at scale with SurveyMonkey SMS Surveys. Reach your audience at critical moments - wherever they are, even if you don't have their email address. Improve response rates with surveys that are optimized for mobile and easy to complete. Customize your message to encourage participation, and easily track individual response status. Get the feedback you need, fast, so you can deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention?, and unlock growth and innovation.

The service can be used to send sms notifications, alerts, and confirmations to clients, as well as to conduct SMS marketing campaigns.

Either install UltraSMSScript on your own server and pay a 1-time fee for the platform, or have us host it for you with our monthly hosted plans! What about the cost to send text messages? In most cases, it's a fraction of a penny. Since we're linked directly to the text-messaging gateways, you only pay the wholesale costs of texts!

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer puts feedback into the hands of those who can take action on it, by integrating feedback into the systems they use every day.
similar_products.features: Alchemer (formerly SurveyGizmo) offers the world's most flexible feedback and data collection platform and survey software, with twice as many question types as the competition and a low-code design that allows innovative thinkers across organizations to solve real business problems cost-effectively. Alchemer serves over 15,000 global customers and 30% of the Fortune 500.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use SMS marketing platform. Send and receive texts from a 6-digit short code or text-enable your current number.
similar_products.features: Send mass texts. Provide customer service. Create automated campaigns. SimpleTexting lets you do it all. There's a reason Fortune 500 companies and small businesses alike choose SimpleTexting to reach their audiences. It really works. Our pricing plans are flexible and our features are designed to help you grow. Whether you need to message thousands at once or have 1-on-1 conversations, SimpleTexting makes it, well, simple. And with our mobile app, you can even manage your efforts from anywhere.

similar_products.short_desc: EZ Texting delivers the smartest, fastest, easiest, and most reliable ways to connect with your customers and clients.
similar_products.features: EZ Texting is a SaaS company that delivers the fastest, easiest, and most reliable way to connect. It has served over 165,000 customers and is the #1 SMS platform for business users, setting the standard for business texting. Our messaging solutions allow businesses to quickly and effectively reach and engage their mobile audiences. With employees around the world, EZ Texting is continuously recognized as a Best Place to Work, as well as a top product for small and mid-market businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: The Cloud Phone System of choice for modern sales and support teams. We help end clueless conversations by adding context to every call
similar_products.features:
The Cloud Phone System of choice for modern sales and support teams. We help end clueless conversations by adding context to every call. Call software, virtual numbers, SMS campaigns, native CRM integrations, and lots more at just $30 per user. 
Sign up and get a 14-day free trial.

similar_products.short_desc: You need more than just mass texting. Trumpia offers fully automated campaigns, so you can engage subscribers without doing more work.
similar_products.features: Mass texting alone won't give you the results you need, especially when sending irrelevant messages. Trumpia offers more than simple texting features, enabling you to accurately target every message you send. Our software will even carry out entire campaigns for you, so you can engage customers automatically without adding more work to your plate. Trumpia is favored by businesses of all sizes including Fortune 500s.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Satisfaction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Satisfaction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Satisfaction software allows businesses to collect, organize, and manage customer feedback. These applications provide survey, complaint tracking and call reporting capabilities. Customer Satisfaction software can integrate with Customer Relationship Management and Product Management solutions to help apply the acquired feedback to business interactions and product development.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top SMS Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of SMS Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: SMS (Text) Marketing software provides the tools needed to launch and support text marketing campaigns. With SMS Marketing software in your arsenal you can quickly subscribe customers and send important alerts with mass messaging tools. Text marketing software can be used to advertise weekly specials, send coupons, solicit feedback, poll customers, and promote contests. Looking for other ways to improve your marketing? Learn more with our Channel Management software, Email Marketing software, and Marketing Automation software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.

category_features.name: Reservations Management
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to book and reserve flights

related_products.short_desc: SMS Marketing 360? helps drive more sales.
related_products.features: SMS Marketing 360 makes creating text message campaigns easy. You can even create automated journeys where specific text messages are sent to specific people at specific times.

related_products.short_desc: iCIMS Talent Cloud is a cloud platform for recruiting that enables employers to manage their end-to-end talent hiring lifecycle.
related_products.features: Built for enterprise organizations, iCIMS is the Talent Cloud company that empowers organizations to attract, engage, hire and advance the right talent that builds a diverse, winning workforce. The iCIMS Talent Cloud is complemented by an ecosystem of more than 700 global partners. Yesterday's tools were not designed for the future of work. iCIMS provides innovations that meet employer's new and emerging strategic business and talent needs.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free SMS marketing software and CRM used by 8 million companies worldwide. Cloud and on-premise, with open source code.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 #1 free SMS marketing software and CRM, used by 8 million companies worldwide. Cloud and on-premise, with open source code access. You can send individual SMS messages even on the free plan, bulk SMS and SMS marketing automation are available to commercial Bitrix24 users, starting at $39/mo. Since we don't add any surcharges on SMS pricing offered by leading SMS providers, we are much cheaper than other SMS marketing services. Currently, you can send text messages in over 100 countries.

related_products.short_desc: The single messaging platform for your business to convert and engage leads and customers over text.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Messaging is a comprehensive digital communication tool that makes it easy to connect with customers across any digital channel, be it text, social, Webchat, email, or voicemail from one unified inbox. 

Birdeye Mass Texting is an affordable and easy way to reach customers through their prefered channel - text messaging. Connect one-on-one or reach thousands of customers in one go.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM's sms marketing software helps to leverage text messaging to maximize the communication channels you use to connect with your audience. Integrating SMS text messaging into your marketing campaigns or sales and support function can help you engage your audience at just the right time.

related_products.short_desc: SMS marketing software built for small business
related_products.features: Meet Thryv, the text (SMS) marketing software built for small business. Thryv integrates your contact list with text (SMS) marketing templates and automation so you can target the right person at the right time with the right message. Include coupons, promotions and interactive buttons that urge recipients to take action.

related_products.short_desc: The powerful texting platform your church and people will love. Send mass texts to your church & engage in two-way text conversations.
related_products.features:
The powerful texting platform your church and people will love.

With Clearstream, you can easily mass text your church and engage in two-way text conversations. But you can also streamline your guest follow-up process with text-to-join Keywords and workflows, manage multiple ministries or campuses with Subaccounts, and much more.

Thousands of churches, from new plants to many of the largest in the U.S., rely on Clearstream to better communicate with their members, and guests through texting.

related_products.short_desc: Mass SMS Text Messaging services. Great for sending bulk text messages, appointment reminders, coupons, sales, and more.
related_products.features: SMS Marketing Services made easy. Instantly send 10 or 100,000 SMS Text messages to any mobile phone number. Easily build an opt-in subscriber list. Schedule text messages to go out any time you want. Track text message delivery. Our plans start with a FREE 14-day trial period. Or try our Annual Plans and pay up-front for one year, and get 20% more messages instantly.

related_products.short_desc: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more.
related_products.features: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more. 55,000+ businesses and more than 2 million developers rely on Twilio to deliver their message when and where it counts.

related_products.short_desc: Swell helps you modernize your customer engagement through automated and one-to-one texting.
related_products.features: Swell helps you connect with customers and prospects through texting to provide seamless experiences and earn new business. It offers message management for everything from automated reminders to mass text campaigns to one-on-one conversations. With Swell, you can set up automatic review invitations to ask happy customers to leave reviews on the platforms that matter so you can rank higher online and get found by prospects.

related_products.short_desc: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more that gives you direct ownership of your customer data and interactions.
related_products.features: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform that gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions, empowering you to turn transactions with customers into productive long-term relationships-at scale. Because the Klaviyo database integrates seamlessly with your tech stack, you can get the full story on every customer that visits, and then-from the same platform-use those insights to automate personalized email and SMS communications that make people feel seen.

similar_products.short_desc: Engage with your customers using bespoke text message marketing campaigns.
similar_products.features:
Mobiz is a hyper-personalized mobile marketing platform that elevates and innovates customer engagement with data-driven personalization. Using a dynamic landing page template library, users can create and send customized mobile marketing campaigns at scale and via SMS in a few easy steps - all totally code-free.

The platform also offers a growth tool, helping users expand their subscriber list easily and compliantly. 

To learn more, visit https://bit.ly/3dRhnCZ

similar_products.short_desc: The single messaging platform for your business to convert and engage leads and customers over text.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Messaging is a comprehensive digital communication tool that makes it easy to connect with customers across any digital channel, be it text, social, Webchat, email, or voicemail from one unified inbox. 

Birdeye Mass Texting is an affordable and easy way to reach customers through their prefered channel - text messaging. Connect one-on-one or reach thousands of customers in one go.

similar_products.short_desc: Attentive's conversational commerce platform helps 5,000+ brands engage customers and drive billions in revenue via SMS marketing.
similar_products.features: Reach your customers where they are-their phones. Attentive's conversational commerce platform helps 5,000+ brands-from retail enterprises to e-commerce entrepreneurs-engage customers and drive billions in revenue via SMS marketing. We'll help you target the right audience for your messages, and measure your most important metrics to optimize your program. And with our flexible integrations, you can easily connect to the rest of your marketing stack, too. Learn more about our free 30-day trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more.
similar_products.features: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more. 55,000+ businesses and more than 2 million developers rely on Twilio to deliver their message when and where it counts.

similar_products.short_desc: EZ Texting delivers the smartest, fastest, easiest, and most reliable ways to connect with your customers and clients.
similar_products.features: EZ Texting is a SaaS company that delivers the fastest, easiest, and most reliable way to connect. It has served over 165,000 customers and is the #1 SMS platform for business users, setting the standard for business texting. Our messaging solutions allow businesses to quickly and effectively reach and engage their mobile audiences. With employees around the world, EZ Texting is continuously recognized as a Best Place to Work, as well as a top product for small and mid-market businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: You need more than just mass texting. Trumpia offers fully automated campaigns, so you can engage subscribers without doing more work.
similar_products.features: Mass texting alone won't give you the results you need, especially when sending irrelevant messages. Trumpia offers more than simple texting features, enabling you to accurately target every message you send. Our software will even carry out entire campaigns for you, so you can engage customers automatically without adding more work to your plate. Trumpia is favored by businesses of all sizes including Fortune 500s. Call us today at 855-912-0700.

similar_products.short_desc: Make marketing your business the easy part with a simple SMS Marketing platform like vcita. Start your free trial today!
similar_products.features: Take your marketing to the next level with simple SMS marketing with vcita. Link each SMS promotion to a beautiful landing page, enabling clients to take revenue-driving actions in a single click. Keep notes and view clients' payment history with ease from a single dashboard, and manage your billing and invoicing liike a pro. Never chase payments again with SMS payment reminders and focus on getting the word out about your services simply and professionally.

similar_products.short_desc: MessageMedia is a global leader in SMS services, providing an engaging messaging platform for over 65,000 businesses.
similar_products.features: We're a mobile messaging solution that helps businesses of all sizes better connect with customers. We create engaging mobile experiences for our 65,000+ global customers and help boost ROI. Find us in the USA, the UK, Australia and NZ.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully featured business text messaging platform to send bulk SMS text messages to customers, staff, and partners.
similar_products.features: TextMagic is a fully featured business text messaging platform that enables companies of all sizes to send bulk SMS text messages to their customers, staff, and partners. The service can be used to send sms notifications, alerts, and confirmations to clients, as well as to conduct SMS marketing campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Whispir is a cloud platform for automating intelligent, rich communications.
similar_products.features: Whispir, Inc. is an all-in-one communications platform designed to help businesses and organizations communicate more humanly with their team and their customers. Whispir's capabilities include a wide range of intelligent messaging solutions, from SMS to email, voice, video, social, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales through the power of texting. Text all your customers in seconds.
similar_products.features: Mobile Text Alerts is an easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales & growth through the power of texting. Get up and running in seconds and enjoy our user-friendly online platform and mobile app, allowing you to easily set up SMS campaigns to market your products/services - engaging with customers and prospects efficiently and effectively. Free up time and hassle with automated messaging, flexible opt-in choices to build your subscriber list, analytics options, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Quick sign up, FREE TRIAL, no credit card required. Send Group SMS, MMS with emoji and short URL tracking. Sign up forms, SMS keywords.
similar_products.features: ProTexting is an SMS marketing platform designed for businesses in all industries. It provides easy to use way to communicate with your customers through group text messaging with emoji and MMS support. You can create text messaging campaigns for mobile surveys, voting, text in questions, text 2 screen, etc. Super FAST sending of your SMS Campaigns. 24/7 monitoring and support. FREE demo and On-boarding sessions are part of the services. FREE Toll-Free number for every account.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Channel Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Channel Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Channel Management software allows companies to streamline their distribution and sales efforts by organizing clients into specific segments and keeping track of marketing outreach and buying patterns. Specific types of Channel Management software focuses on partner programs. Channel Management software is related to Marketing Automation software, eCommerce software and Lead Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Marketing software helps businesses reach and engage their audiences on mobile devices via text messages and mobile optimized promotional offers and notifications.
